descript.abstract: Locations of commercial ethanol manufacturing plants in the state of Minnesota as identified to the Department of Agriculture.
descript.purpose: This data set was developed with the intent of enabling GIS professionals, regulatory personnel, and emergency responders with accurate information regarding the locations of ethanol plants in Minnesota. This is considered industrial information and is not consumer oriented since the products dispensed require bulk purchases and/or licensed users.

idinfo.useconst: By acceptance of this data, the user agrees to include a copy of this metadata record, including the liability disclaimer, whenever the user transmits or provides the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user.

dataqual.complete: Data is complete as of September 2009
dataqual.logic: Points have been verified whenever possible using air photos.

enttyp.enttypl: Table of attributes associated with Ethanol Plants in Minnesota

attr.attrdef: Unique ID for the data set.
Estimated or reported annual ethanol production in Millions of Gallons.
A rating of the confidence the agency has in the location.

edom.edomvd: Very High: Location has been GPS'd or identified using heads-up digitizing by a knowledgeable party over high-resolution aerial photography
High: Location has been address matched with a high degree of confidence using multiple levels of complete street, city, and zip code information
Medium: Location has been matched to a Public Land Survey (PLS) description to the section level or beyond
Low: Location has been matched to a Public Land Survey (PLS) description at the township level, or a zip code, city or county centroid
Unknown: Unknown methods were used to create the location

distinfo.distliab: This data was developed by the Minnesota Department of Agriculture (MDA) for its own internal business purposes. MDA DOES NOT REPRESENT OR WARRANT THAT THE DATA OR DOCUMENTATION ARE ERROR-FREE, COMPLETE, CURRENT, OR ACCURATE. The user accepts the data 'as is', and is responsible for any consequences resulting from its use. The user should consult the data documentation for this particular data to determine its limitations and the precision with which it may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. By accepting this data, the user agrees not to transmit this data or provide access to it or any part of it to another party unless the user shall include with the data a copy of this disclaimer.
